products.name: Men's Classic T-Shirt
products.description: A classic crew-neck t-shirt for men, made from soft and breathable cotton fabric. Suitable for everyday wear and available in various colors and sizes.

products.name: Women's Running Shoes
products.description: Lightweight and supportive running shoes designed specifically for women. Features responsive cushioning and a breathable mesh upper for optimal comfort and performance.

products.description: A stylish and functional leather wallet for men. Features multiple card slots, a bill compartment, and a sleek design that fits comfortably in pockets.

products.name: Women's Sunglasses
products.description: Fashionable sunglasses for women, designed to provide both style and UV protection. Features polarized lenses and durable frames.
